headlines.shortHeadline: Twitter zai haramta tallan 'yan siyasa
headlines.headline: Twitter zai haramta tallan 'yan siyasa

promo.summary: Shafin sada zumunta na Twitter ya sanar da cewa zai haramta duk wani talla da ya shafi siyasa a fadin duniya.

indexImage.caption: Mai shafin twitter Jack Dorsey ya ce kamfanin zai yi cikakken bayani a cikin watan Nuwamba

headlines.shortHeadline: 'Babu ranar bude iyakokin Najeriya'
headlines.headline: Hukumar kwastam ta ce babu ranar bude iyakokin Najeriya

promo.summary: Hukumar hana fasa kwabri a Najeriya ta ce har yanzu gwamnati ba ta kayyade lokacin bude iyakokin kasar da aka rufe ba tun 21 ga watan Agusta.

headlines.shortHeadline: FIFA za ta dakatar da Cardiff City sayen 'yan wasa
headlines.headline: Emiliano Sala: FIFA za ta dakatar da Cardiff daga sayen 'yan wasa

promo.summary: Hukumar kwallon kafa ta duniya FIFA za ta dakatar da kulob din Cardiff City daga saye da musayar 'yan wasa na kakar wasa uku indai ta gaza biyan kungiyar Nantes fan miliyan 15 na dan wasan tsakiya Emiliano Sala ba.

indexImage.altText: Emiliano Sala ya takawa Bordeaux leda kafin ya koma Nantes a 2015
indexImage.caption: Emiliano Sala ya takawa Bordeaux leda kafin ya koma Nantes a 2015

headlines.shortHeadline: Yadda aka yi zakin Kano ya koma gidansa?
headlines.headline: Yadda aka yi zakin Kano ya koma gidansa?

promo.summary: Akwai wani mai ba shi abinci, wanda ke iya magana da shi ta hanyar alamu, to da shi ne aka samu ya shawo kan zakin wajen nuna masa akuyar da aka ajiye a dakinsa, hakan kuma ta sa nan da nan zakin ya shige ciki sai aka rufe.

headlines.shortHeadline: Me ke tsakanin Aisha Buhari da iyalan Mamman Daura?

promo.summary: Baraka ta kunno kai a Fadar Shugaban Najeriya a daidai lokacin da ake yada jita-jitar cewa Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari zai yi wa matarsa kishiya.

indexImage.caption: Kotun ta zartar da hukuncin aurar da 'yan mata idan suka kai shekara 18

headlines.headline: Saudiyya ta amince mata su kama otal

promo.summary: Hukumomin Saudiyya sun amince masu yawon bude ido mace da namiji su kama dakin Otal ba tare da bin diddigin dangantakar da ke tsakaninsu ba.

promo.summary: Rundunar sojojin Najeriya ta ce karancin bayanai da kuma rashin yin aiki tare ne dalilan da suka jawo kisan 'yan sandan nan uku da sojoji suka yi tare da fararen hula biyu a jihar Taraba ranar 6 ga watan Agusta.

indexImage.caption: Bayan 'yan sandan uku har da farar hula biyu a wadanda sojojin suka kashe

headlines.shortHeadline: An sako 'yan mata 6 da aka sace a Kaduna

headlines.shortHeadline: 'Yan fashi na son mazauna wani kauye a Katsina su biya N2m

headlines.shortHeadline: Saudiyya za ta kara haraji ga fasinjojin jiragen sama
headlines.headline: Saudiyya za ta kara haraji ga fasinjojin jiragen sama

promo.summary: A 'yan kwanakin nan dai, Saudiyya na ta fito da sabbin hanyoyin samun kudin shiga domin rage dogaro da arzikin danyen man fetur.

headlines.shortHeadline: 'Muna bincike kan bidiyon cin zarafi'
headlines.headline: Sojojin Najeriya sun nesanta kansu daga bidiyon cin zarafi

promo.summary: A karshen makon da ya gabata ne dai aka ga wasu sojoji a bidiyon suna harbe wani da aka ce dan Boko Haram ne bayan sun ja shi a kasa hannayensa daure da igiya sannan suka cilla shi cikin rami kuma suka harbe shi.

headlines.headline: Me kuka sani game da salon kidan jazz?
